caption: The pizza is great, no complaints. But the tiramisu is a total disappointment and rip-off, so skip it. This is coming from a pastry chef. Call me and I'll make it for you :).
This is the best Pizza place that I ever been to.. We loved all plates. We have to drive for an hour, but we keep thinking and we'll go back in two weeks.
Always great ! Been coming here for years . Best pizza in nyc
Best pizza and environment in Brooklyn 👌🏽
Great friendly service and nice soft crust with unique seasonal topping combinations
Amazing food!
The Napoli was great, especially for 14 dollars.

First off,  if you don't or have not solo dined, do yourself a favor and go and experience it.  My review is both to praise the food and there server but cause awareness on how tough it is out there for restaurants.  So I had the prosciutto e Funghi pizza with a magnificently paired wine. The dough was fresh and had this gorgeous char that only comes from a brick oven, the sauce was light and sweet and bagged you to continue to eat. The wine had nicely earthy notes that paired well with the mushrooms. Definitely an envelope siciliano style pizza. My server had this welcoming and charming personality that meshed so well with the place, amazingly accomodating. As far as outdoor dining goes it was well secure of the elements far better then most Bushwick establishments. I was warm and had no wind whipping me in my face and didnt have to wear gloves to eat my food. Though that is the less ideal way, we do what we do in order to keep these restaurants open during this harsh climate.  Also, be mindful of the strain this places are going through and tip generously!
Simply the best. Nobody needs Roberta's when you have Union Pizza Works serving up a tight margherita pizza. Beautiful little spot with a nice outdoor dining sitch. Love these guys.

Had a great experience in Union Pizza on New Years Eve. Our server Ricardo went above and beyond. The food was delicious especially the pasta on the specials menu. I would highly recommend this restaurant if you are considering eating out in 2021. Thanks again Ricardo for your excellent service.

My fav pizza place in Brooklyn. I would recommend the focaccia with prosciutto and stracchino, it's amazing! Also, noticeable mention to the tiramisu, the best that I had in the area:) Love the daily menu offer, the place, the happy people, and the mood! Love it
high prices
Great pizza, super Negronis!!!
Great date spot! The food is delicious and not too heavy.

Pizza - Amazing  Mixed veg app (Brussels, apples, and yam) - sounds weird, tastes great!  Gorgonzola pasta - they say ravioli but it's shaped more like wonton money bags. Nonetheless, delicious!  Panna cotta - make you wanna slap yo momma good!

The food is really good but what I enjoy the most is the friendly staff and setting. Overall, a very enjoyable experience. But if I remember correctly from a previous experience is that they don't take credit cards, hence why they lose a star.
Phenomenal. I think the margarita is the best around.
Lovely staff and amazing food! Ask for the special menu of the day!
Amazing place. Not just the pizza. Everything! The wait staff is very warm and the service is top notch!

Ended up here on a whim on a Saturday. Fortunately we were able to make a last minute reservation at lunch and were delighted with the result. The restaurant is small and constantly busy. The pizza is the star as it well should be. We shared and appetizer and a pizza. With a glass of wine, coffee and a fabulous salted caramel budino we paid close to $70 for lunch. Prices are on the steep side, but you are getting quality ingredients.
Great great great.  Go there all the time.  Delicious food friendly service.

I've been coming here for about 2 years. The staff and atmosphere is very welcoming. The lead hostess, Ricardo, is well loved by the ladies, the babes, and the Abes (thats me). Mierco, the manager, is always in good spirits and can recommend a good spirit too. Thank you all for being such a great addition to the bushwick collective. Abe
Great environment, great service, and even better pizza
Delicious!  Check out the one at Stone Ride Orchard!
Very Nice
Fav. Pizza in NYC!

This was my first time here and there were two toddlers in my party of 4! Grand ole time and what's in the Kale Salad????....crack!?!? I didn't do the ordering but we had one pie with prosciutto and another white pie with onions! Pro-tip roll kale salad in your slices of pizza!!! The tiramisu and panna cotta were an excellent end to a terrific dinner!
UPW is legit Italian.

(Translated by Google) Excellent, highly recommend, really nice place, excellent pizza, not too expensive! Well done to the boss.  (Original) Excellent, recommande vivement, endroit vraiment sympa, pizza excellentes, pas trop cher ! Bravo au patron.
Great place serving amazing pizza! The staff is also very kind! I will definitely be back often!

(Translated by Google) Great Italian restaurant, lovely welcome, typical Brooklyn room and delicious food  (Original) Très bon restau italien, accueil adorable, salle typique de brooklyn et plats délicieux
My favorite favorite pizza place when I lived in Bushwick. The margarita pizza is always amazing, and the atmosphere and customer service is great. Miss this place!!
Pizza  is delicious and service is great

The food was outstanding.  Incredibly delicious and made me feel nourished and not just full.  The service and atmosphere was top notch.  Massimo, our server, was the bomb dot com.  Quite possibly the greatest server in the whole city.
Excellent pizza. Beautiful place with nice vibe.
Yammi, excellent margarita

I was really excited to come to this place because it was so cute. I’m gluten free so there wasn’t much I could eat but the heirloom tomato plate sounded lovely, albeit expensive at $13. I order it, and they bring me a large white plate filled halfway- perfectly dividing the plate in two- with baby tomatoes cut in half. Just half of the plate had food on it, no garnish, nothing, just a plain white ceramic plate. With what looked like a $4 box of Trader Joe’s organic baby tomatoes chopped up. I told them something was missing from the plate, but they said that’s the way it’s supposed to be. I sent it back, I wasn’t going to pay so much for half a plate of chopped tomatoes. The burrata was tasty, though, hence the 2 stars.
(Translated by Google) Super restaurant, it was very good, real Italian food, tiramisu is excellent  (Original) Super resto, c'était très bon, des vrais mets Italiens, le tiramisu est excellent
Awesome neighborhood pizza!
Best pizza in brooklyn
Great space. The food is low quality.
Waiter took awhile to come back to us to get his check. But the pizza is great, ik including the spicy olive oil.
Fantastic pizza and great atmosphere. I bring out of town guests here instead of the tourist traps in Dumbo.
Really good pizza. It was pretty napolitan !!!!!
Cannot knock this place for being cash only - The pizza is amazing and the ascetic is inviting and rustic. Great for large and small groups!
CASH ONLY. CASH ONLY. CASH ONLY  This is a note to self. Great food. Will come again and bring cash next time
Excellent food
Great pizza!!! Attentive staff!

Excellent!! Requested to be seated outside even if it was drizzling rain but they satisfied my request🥰 mussels was outstanding!!!!! With picante (spicy) flavor!!!!🌟🔥🔥🔥⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️thanks Djordje⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
One the best pizza restaurants in NYC. 😋
Real Italian cozy place with delicious pizzas and friendly atmosphere. I visit regularly!
Amazing ambience and great staff
The happy hour pizza deal was a great deal and the bartender was really nice. Pizza tasted great!
The food tasted fresh, the atmosphere was friendly.

Great little spot! I walked over here after a show at Brooklyn Mirage. The servers were Italian and extremely friendly and polite.  I enjoyed sitting outside with a Napoli pizza. It's a pretty cool neighborhood too. I would recommend.
Good pizza and drinks. Outdoor seating.
(Translated by Google) Good attention!!!  (Original) Buena atención!!!

(Translated by Google) This is real Italian food. TOP pizza TOP chef Very nice people. The pizza is better than many Italian pizzas, the cuisine is accurate and tasty.  (Original) This is real Italian food. TOP pizza TOP chef Very nice people. La pizza è meglio di molte pizze italiane, la cucina è curata e gustosa.
Great food, awesome atmosphere, excellent staff!

This is what I call a great business model. The restaurant is beautifully decorated. The pizza is so good and the ingredients are surprisingly of a great quality. The brick oven makes it even tastier. The staff team is amazing. I went with my friend and he forgot to tell them that he's vegetarian and asked them to give us whatever they recommend. They brought us 2 pizzas and then we told them that he's vegetarian. They apologized for the inconvenience and brought us a vegetarian pizza and refused to charge us for it, although it was definitely our mistake. This is a restaurant that I will go to again and again.
Great pizza
(Translated by Google) Good Italian food in Brooklyn  (Original) Buona mangiata italiana a Brooklyn
Super pizza! Cozy place.
Good pizza, very nice fennel appetizer. Good ambiance, but cash only.
Super !!!!!
Pretty good pizza.
Really cool place in Bushwick. love this pizza !!!!!
Delicious! Great option when Roberta’s has too big of a wait.

I love pizza very much. I eat pizza a lot and I go to different places to try every week in Brooklyn and I was left disappointed by this place. They pizza was just OK. The dough was very good and perfectly cooked but the Tomatoe sauce was plain and flavorless.  Also the service for us was bad. We ordered a couple of beers which took forever to come and catching the servers attention was almost impossible. We were trying to get the check for like 10 mins and the place wasn't even full.  The best thing about the place is the restaurant itself. It is very pretty and cozy. But the rest was disappointing.
(Translated by Google) Very good. Trendy place in the middle of Bushwick street art  (Original) Très bonnes. Lieu branché au milieu du Bushwick street art

I really like this place. BUT and here it is . The wait staff is a bit out there . Do not order appertizers and  your main dish together. Why ? Cause they all come out at once which is annoying to say the least . From now on I order my Apps first eat than we order the main course , The pizza in on point . Plus the food is really good . By all mean go you will be pleased just follow my lead on ordering . Spring time  outside eat is fun . This place isn't a wallet buster either . CASH only FYI
Always been my favorite pizza spot in the neighborhood by far.  Always get myself a fungi pizza and captain Lawrence ipa

The service on a Saturday night was terrible. The wait staff fail to seat us after an hour. I have never commented on the way staff but this was just something that needs to be said. There were countless tables available and stood open for the same time that we were there.  The food was good wasn't great at expect more from a place that is strictly Pizza. You're better off going somewhere else.
Great pizza
Charming European vibe with indoor/covered patio and outdoor space. Never too crowded, food is always delicious, service is warm and chill. Only drawback: cash only.
Best Pizza in Brooklyn
My absolute favorite spot in Bushwick. Centrally located, but also tucked away nicely. Highly recommend the fungi pizza, their dough is sublime.
6 stars if I could give it

We were a party of 8 people, all Italians as the waiter who served us. We came there to celebrate the birthday of a friend, who brought a cake. Pizza very good but when we paid the waiter came back with the check asking if there were any problems because we didn't leave them the tip they wanted. We left a sum between 15 and 18%, but for him it wasn't enough so we left other money and left. The pizza is good but the place was very cold (apparently, only one wood stove to heat all the place); moreover, some of us needed to take over the contact lens because the restaurant was very smoky (probably because of the wood oven). Considering all these details, the waiter's behavior was very inappropriate.
One of the best pizza that I ate in NY !!!
Best pizza in NYC - better than Robertas / Lucali etc. Crust is tastier and better flavours. You must come here
Amazing pizza and service was wonderful.
Excellent pizza. Overpriced.
Great
Best pizza in New York
Lovely terrace and great pizza, loved it

(Translated by Google) A friend told me that they grab one. Rich pizza. And solpresa. Yes it was. Rich your pizza will pass more often  (Original) Un amigo me comento que asen una. Rica pizza. Y solpresa.   Si estaba. Rica su pizza pasare mas seguido

It is a beautiful space for both indoor and outdoor crowd. Ideal spot for brunch in the hipster heaven of Brooklyn. Most dishes are big portion, great for sharing. Staffs are very friendly and attentive!
Real Italian pizza with a great service minded  staff.
(Translated by Google) Rich and cool  (Original) Rico y buena onda
Food was delicious and service was great! Hands down, best chocolate mousse I ever had! A bit pricy, but worth it.
Better than Roberta’s. Hands down. If your looking for an Naples style pie, this is your spot. Great service, great drinks and even better pizza.

I think it is becoming my spot :) the staff are very nice. Pizza is good. the place is causal yet pretty and cozy. lovely plants in the front yard. The only complain is that it is Cash-Only, they have atm though.
Nice place, the only thing is that it’s cash only. Great spritz and environment
These pizzas were good
Good prices and beautiful outdoor/indoor space! Nice, helpful staff. Decent pizza, the sauce isn’t great though.

Pure goodness. Second time there and it was as good as the first. There are murals in the area, their is even one in the restaurant itself which is very stylish. The staff is very nice so I shall go again
love the outdoor setting. service could be quicker but they were polite

Great pizza. Staff is friendly. Service was great too.  I really like the vibe here.  The space is decorated well it's open and spacious. It's a great atmosphere, and the pizza it's perfect. Truly one of the best in wood fired pies in Brooklyn.
Is amazing people the two guy the first one pizza man and the guy work on the bar they are amazing I really like this place
(Translated by Google) It was too big for Japanese people! It was delicious with a real kiln-baked pizza  (Original) 日本人には大きすぎるくらいのピザでした！窯焼きの本場のピザで美味しかった

Nice place, pizza, Margarita, was very good, pasta was ok. It was a little bit weird when my pasta was brought to the table and the pizza my husband ordered came 5-7 minutes later. Otherwise it's a good place to get pizza and sit outside with cocktail
Try pizza four cheese (Quattro formaggi) and the braven white IPA

Many of the reviews say that this is the best pizza in Brooklyn. I'm adding my vote that it's very good. I don't want to argue, I just want to eat it.  We had the Breakfast pizza with tomatoes, scamorza, arugula, egg, and bacon. It was supposed to have asparagus on it and no one said anything... Whatever...  We also shared a very solid kale salad with sun-dried tomatoes and anchovies in a rich dressing. The service seems a bit gruff and harried.  It was much more chill than Roberta's. I'm looking forward to checking out the rest of the menu next time.
The best birthday party my sister had there along with family and friends😁😁😊😊😘😘💖💞💖💞🌸🌸

My favorite place in the neihgbourhood. Super friendly service, great pizza (much better than the overhyped Roberta's), nice drinks and everything is reasonably priced. Nice ambiance both on the inside and outside. Cash only, though.

Outstanding Pizza and Good drinks. The dough is fluffy, fresh and well rested, with a strong grainy taste. Prime ingredients on top, which coming out of the big woodfire oven, brings you straight into central  Italy.
The best pizza in NY! Great wine and a really nice atmosphere.
Always a great experience! Great food and special vibe! Love this place
Had such a great meal. Try the mozzarella and parma ham appetiser, and the gorgonzola pizza.
Favourite Italian restaurant of mine. Authentic food, awesome Italian staff, family vibes. Just perfect. Also perfect for a group to celebrate whatever occasion you wanna celebrate.
Good pizza,nice location. Cash only - ATM outside.

Agreed this is the best pizza in NY.  True Neapolitan In the style of Roberta’s but union is better.  Better crust better flavor.  Also takes five minutes to come out not 30 min.  Great people and reasonable prices.
Good
People of Bushwick. And NYC. This is one of the best pizza here. And I'm Italian . So.
The best pizza in New york. I love this place.
Excellent food. Service needs improvement.  If there's a crowd, expect to wait a LONG time for your pizza.

Nice pizza place by itself on the block, it has variety of small pizza pies and is a bit pricey. The types of pizza is what catches attn, there's also few other options besides pizza. Not much parking in the neighborhood but if you're lucky you can find something nearby
I highlyy recommend the nero d'avolo
If it’s a weekend and you don’t want to wait 3 hours for Roberta’s, come here instead. Great owner, amazing pizza and the mussels are BOMB

Quite a gem of a pizza place. Lovely atmosphere with excellent pizza and assortment of pizza. Really fast service and plenty of room. Very clean and delicious and even has its own bar.  They only take cash, however there is a ATM right outside if you need.
Authentic good Italian good and environment
Luca is the best waiter there!
Quality pizza, red wine— what more could you ask for?
Amazing pizza. Very good for low-key date
Good clean eating for pizza and fis
A fave local authentic Italian pasta and P Pizzaria!! Wood burning stove and great drinks too!!
One of our favorite pizza places in the city.
Cool cost place. Best pizza in bushwick
As good as Roberta's, but without the crazy lines. Relaxing environment, amazing food, great service.

There are other more well known pizza joints in New York but for me, these guys do the best pies! I’ve no idea how they are not more widely known. The rest of their menu is fantastic quality and also very affordable, particularly the happy hour meal deals! I can’t visit NYC without eating here.
I was here first time and there was amazing. Good service, good price for drinks (good choice of beer and wine from Italy) and of course amazing pizzi (I’ve had 4 fromages). Highly recommended

The food was good, servers were nice but kept messing the orders up.  - they didn't put all of our tables order in. So all but one got their meal.  - I ordered a Mezcal mule and they brought me a Moscow mule. Then told me that they don't do mezcal mules because they don't deviate from the cocktail menu.  I inquired once more with another server who said that wasn't true and retrieved a MEZCAL mule.  The place wasn't even busy.
(Translated by Google) Good pizza, but a bit burned and inattentive service  (Original) Gute Pizza, aber etwas verbrannt und unaufmerksamer Service

Loved the outdoor seating and pizza was absolutely delicious. Service quick and efficient, but not very engaging. Tried two items off the special menu (a margarita-style pie and an order of roasted fennel). Really enjoyed everything. 👍👍
Authentic Neopolitan pizza in a Bushwick garage setting creates a warm and hip place to enjoy some of the best pizza in the neighborhood.
Great pizza, lovely outdoor seating area.
The pizza here is very good and authentic, but the service sucks. Every time I go it seems to get worse. Always have to flag down the waiter for drinks and the check
Overpriced for ordinary pizza, except for the fact it was inferior quality, very unsatisfied!

Fabulous ambiance, great food and friendly and intelligent service. Warehouse backyard style eating area with some great street art and fresh herbs all around. Family friendly, great menu. Great range of beer and food and deserts were beautifully presented and delicious. Quite busy, but service was very personal and the staff very responsive and kind to the children.  Rolling Stones, great soundtrack.

Love this spot, easily the best pizza spot in Manhattan/ Brooklyn that I have been to, Robertas has nothing on this place . Food is quick. Decor and ambiance is rustic, open brick, there's a fire place thin, lots of seating, staff are awesome and the pizzas are superb. My favorite is the Salami Picante

Dear UPW Thank you for feeding our soul with God’s pizza! We had such a good time this Saturday! The ambiance was also wonderful and the waiter and waitress were not only attentive but also fun! We wish Union Pizza Works keeps growing and never lose the Italian, Latin & European authenticity and taste!
The food and drinks are good but the service is so consistently terrible I had to stop going.
Tim K's fav pizza spot
Great hospitality ! Foid and dessert where great

Union serves up authentic thin crust pizza in a converted garage space. It's warm and comfortable, with good drinks. Though the pizza gets a bit droopy in the center, it's tasty, and the pasta dishes steal the show. Try the rigatoni Norma, with sautéed eggplant and ricotta - delicious!

This might be my new favorite pizza spot in bushwick. The napoli is sweet and salty from the capers and anchovies, and the salame pizza is comfortingly amazing. We came here two nights in a row. UPW murders Robertas any day.
My favorite restaurant! Located in a fantastic place. The waiters are sympathetic and friendly. So if you go to visit Bushwick, you have to go there!
Absolutely delicious pizza in a cool industrial atmosphere. Highly recommend!
(Translated by Google) Original Pizza!  (Original) Original pizza!
Great food , unbelievable Pizza
Always a good time and of course delicious food
Best Pizza in Brooklyn. Cheapest flight to Italy is off the L train
Arguably my favorite restaurant in NYC.  it's definitely a great date spot , though I really enjoy going alone.  Thr service,  food,  and ambience is all equally amazing.
Great brick oven pizzas... Never disappoints
Grate service. Grate food l
Great fennel
Nice Brooklyn atmosphere and good pizza! 👌🏼
The best pizza in ny. The service was really fast and the ambiance was good. Would definitely recommend.
BOMB ASS PIZZA
Unbelievable pizza great people
(Translated by Google) Super Pizzeria  (Original) Super Pizzeria
Excellent pizza and very friendly service
Really good pizza and Pana Cotta!
Amazing atmosphere, amazing cocktails, fantastic pizza. Will definitely be back.

(Translated by Google) The food is rich and the price is fair. The atmosphere is a plus, nice and spacious. We went on a Saturday and the music was too loud for a restaurant. There were 2 people, we ate the burrata, funghi pizza and chocolate mousse for dessert. Everything was fine, not excellent, but rich. As a negative point, they do not have the option of non-alcoholic drinks (only soda, coca or bottle water).  (Original) La comida es rica y el precio es justo. El ambiente es un plus, lindo y espacioso. Fuimos un sábado y la música estaba demasiado fuerte para un restaurante. Éramos 2 personas, comimos la burrata, pizza de funghi y mousse de chocolate de postre. Todo estuvo bien, no excelente, pero rico. Como punto negativo no tienen opción de bebidas sin alcohol (solo gaseosa linea coca o agua de botella).

If you serve ingredients out of a can, at least strain those ingredients before throwing them on a pizza. I ordered the funghi pizza and the mushrooms were so wet in can water that it made the pizza soggy and dripping.. Ruining the pizza. Didn't ask for a new one because service was so slow that it took over 40 mins to get the pizza in the first place. Never coming back.
solid pies in a nice space.

It's crazy that an established restaurant in 2016 operates on cash only. But fear not, there's a cash machine in the front with hefty ATM fees. Service was slow. The pizza was good but not exceptional.  I'd have given it 4 stars if I was only evaluating the food. But they lose a star for speed and a star for not taking debit/credit cards. This is, after all, the 21st century.

Fantastic pizza.  This pizza is just as good as Roberta's pizza.  It has delicious hand-rolled dough, fresh ingredients, wood-fired oven.  I got a pizza to go.  The decor of this restaurant bar is really nice, warm, cozy, intimate, with low lighting and wooden and rustic decor.  Recommend.  On Troutman Avenue in Bushwick, Brooklyn, New York, a 5 minute walk from the Jefferson Avenue L train.

Sadly, I've realized that the really nice outdoor patio is the only reason I've been coming here. The food is not so good. The pizza sauce on the margarita was thin and bitter, and the basil was scant. The dough didn't make up for it. We also got a special that was an heirloom tomato dish, but it was small and too basic for the $12 price, and was served with bread that had to be two-days old. The menu has a limited wine selection, and they are all overpriced. For two personal pizzas, 1/2 a liter of house white, and the small tomato dish, our bill was $100 (including tip). This is the third time I've come and been disappointed. I love the patio, but the quality of the food doesn't justify the cost just for that.
The staff is attentive and the vibe is relaxing. The music playlist was perfect for summer!

Great outdoor/indoor seating space. Pizza is amazing! Seriously amazing.. i'd recommend ordering two pizzas because one won't be enough. Oh, and the MUSIC is amazing, one of the best playlists i've ever heard in a restaurant. 5/5 location,food,music and service
Cool and cozy spot to eat pizza. Servers are nice and It's easy to find the second place near hear.
Our last pizza before leaving NYC, couldn't ask for a better pizza place, awesome friendly staff. A definite must visit on our next trip.
Staff and atmosphere are nice; the pizza has a lot of room for improvement though.
Good: cozy vibe, great food, and service. Bad: small portions, over-priced, cash-only.

Rustic, modern, and spacious. This pizzeria has a great mixed space, full of vibrant details that will make it memorable. Sit inside, sit outside - the staff here is friendly and the food is delicious. The Piccante (spicy olive oil) is a MUST - even if you are not a fan of spicy food. You won't be disappointed.  PRO-TIP: this venue is CASH ONLY. ATM conveniently located by the door.
Solid neapolitan pizza in a beautifully casual setting.  Glass wines at reasonable prices.  Nice outdoor space for fair weather dining.
Great food !
Great ambiance, friendly service and amazing food! The grass fed burger was delicious!
Italian staff and great pizza, but only cash accepted!
Beautiful outdoor space with live music on Wednesdays. Thin crust wood fired pizzas at a decent price
Good food, good drinks and super cool ambience. Great place to take a date.

(Translated by Google) I had dinner the other day at night and to be Wednesday there were many people. We had an assortment of pizzas and also a salad and the tagliatelle with salmon, everything was great. The staff very nice. I loved the assortment of draft beers, I tried them all. I will be back  (Original) Estuve cenando el otro día por la noche y para ser miércoles había mucha gente. Tomamos un surtido de pizzas y también una ensalada y los tagliatelle con salmón, todo estaba buenísimo. El personal muy agradable. El surtido de cervezas de barril también me encantó, las probé todas. Volveré
My father is from Italy and has owned a wood burning oven restaurant for 30 years...  I promise you - you'll be hard pressed to find a better group of guys and better food.
Big outdoor space, yummy starters and pizza and all Italian staff. Only takes cash
Best pizza in Bushwick. Very friendly and attentive staff. We will be back next time we are in town.
Best pizza . Best service. Best everything !
Amazing pizza with a great atmosphere. I recommend the salami piccante
Good location but bland pizza.  Nothing hugely wrong with the food but nothing hugely right. Cool place though and nice staff.
Really yummy pizza with a nice outdoor part of the restaurant.  Gets busy though
Best Pizza I Had Tried in NY! DOPE
Really great tasting pizza. Not as cheap as some places, but definitely worth it if you are in the mood for something nice.
